content: these pretty face scrubbies are made using the two double_crochet cluster stitch this lovely stitch creates the best of both worlds with a lightly textured combined facial scrubby/make-up round soft and smooth on one side great for make-up removal bumpy and textured on the other perfect for gentle exfoliation this pattern is part of the calm clusters spa set with 4 patterns all free to view on the website **recommended yarn** any soft cotton #3 dk weight yarn approx 11 5yds/10 5m 0 18oz/5g per scrubby **yarn used ** rico essentials organic cotton dk 100% organic cotton in shade 004 pink 115yds/105m per 1 76oz/50g 1 x 50g ball of this yarn will make 6 scrubbies plus a mesh washbag for them separate pattern **hooks & other materials** us size 7 4 5mm yarn needle stitch marker sharp scissors **skill level** easy **sizes/finished measurements** approx 3 4 8 5cm diameter are you on my email list i offer exclusive discounts on new pattern releases for my email subscribers and you ll always hear of any offers and events i m taking part in if you would like to join just click below join email list 1 note on selling items and copyright the pattern and all images are copyright janferie mackintosh all rights reserved please do not copy or share any part of this document you may print it for your own use please do not alter it and try to claim it as your own pattern you may not use photographs of this pattern without permission you may not make tutorial videos from this pattern you may sell finished items handmade in small quantities by you design credit is appreciated thank you please note that instant download pdfs files cannot be refunded 1 https //thecraftytherapist com/subscribe/
